page.title: 06Stokes School Blaby.
page.content: {1985.-Environment.}Campus,3.4 hectares,2 buildings,12 classrooms,313 children,playing fields,flower beds,2 caretakers bungalows. {Curriculum-}English-written/oral work includes all forms of creative writing and the structure of language, acting, discussions,poetry and literature. Mathematics covers the rules and structure of number and computation, and their application in life.Other lesson activities include Science, Art,Topic Work (which often integrates aspects of Environmental Studies, Geography & History).Wider curriculum includes, Assemblies(religious and secular);a wide range of Sports, Athletics and Swimming. New technology has resulted in 4 BBC micro computers acquired over the last 2 Yrs.{Special {Activities-}Country Dancing, Music and Community events and Competitions.
